name: Blades of Boltar
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Energy Redistribution Unit drops in Alien Playfields and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Energy Redistribution Unit" "257961" #L "Kyr'Ozch Energy Rapier - Type 992" "254721" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Energy Redistribution Unit + Kyr'Ozch Energy Rapier - Type 992 = #L "Blades of Boltar" "257147" Note: Rapier needs to be QL250+
